full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

This is perfect. Please apply the changes to all of the other pages. Keep in mind, all of the content varies not just the suburb but some other content changes so make sure you carefully copy and paste each document into the pages, even if it takes a little longer to complete the task. Also make sure the URL (slug) is something like littlelearnersacademy.com.au/serviceareas/austral.

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Dimitri,

We have made the updates and ready for you to review.

Here's the draft page:
https://littlelearnersacademy.com.au/?page_id=471

Please note that you need to logged in to the site's WP Admin dashboard to view the link.

Let us know if that's good so we can apply the changes to the other pages.

Thanks!

Hi @rica done updating Austral Page
https://littlelearnersacademy.com.au/?page_id=471

  • ✅ We also need to add more "Book A Tour" buttons/call to actions across the page. Can you please do this for us?
  • ✅ Please make sure all the photos are different, I noticed you have used the same photo placeholder.
  • ✅ Please change the hyperlink on the green overlay (Book A Tour) to a colour like white which contrasts with the green as now you can't see the hyperlink.
  • ✅ Please centre the text in the Book A Tour section to align with the headline which is also centred.

Let me know if all good so I can go ahead and update the other pages (thirlmere, bonynyrigg, green valley, kemps creek, liverpool, prestons, rossmore)

Time: +20mins

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

We also need to add more "Book A Tour" buttons/call to actions across the page. Can you please do this for us?

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Rica, Here's some feedback:
  • Please make sure all the photos are different, I noticed you have used the same photo placeholder.
  • Please change the hyperlink on the green overlay (Book A Tour) to a colour like white which contrasts with the green as now you can't see the hyperlink.
  • Please centre the text in the Book A Tour section to align with the headline which is also centred.
Please let us know once this is done. Regards, Dimitri

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Dimitri,

We've created the new template for the location pages and have uploaded the first draft. You can access it via the WP Admin Dashboard of the site.

Here's the link to preview the draft page: Little Learners Academy - Location Page.

Please review the design and content, and once approved, we'll proceed with updating the remaining seven locations.

Looking forward to your feedback.

Hi @rica I've completed one page for client review (Leading Childcare & Preschool in Austral).

Please review it and let me know if everything is good. Once confirmed, I'll proceed with the remaining 7 items. I want to ensure that I'm doing it correctly as I'm not very familiar with the Oxygen Builder used on the site.

Challenges/Blockers:
  • I intended to integrate Google Maps, but it appears there isn't a Google Maps widget available. I'm unsure whether the client is using the premium version of Oxygen Builder or the free version.

Ready to review: https://littlelearnersacademy.com.au/?page_id=471&preview=true

Time: +45mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez
